title: Super Boats
brief_description: Come sailing on a worldwide, whirlwing adventure as Beyond 2000 examines the future of life on the ocean waves. A dinghy that flies, the world’s first water-jet propelled private luxury ocean cruiser, and windweapon - a cross between a windsurfer and a hang glider are just three of the amazing discoveries.
